sakai:title: Pooled Content - All
sakai:shortDescription: Search pooled content such as files and documents.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "q", "description" : "The search term you wish to search on. This will search trough the actual content of the file and any properties on the node."}
{"name" : "tags", "description" : "Only match content tagged with these values. These are tag IDs, not the displayed tag text."}
{"name" : "sortOn", "description" : "The name of the property you wish to sort on. This only has any affect if it is used with the sortOrder parameter. The default is score."}
{"name" : "sortOrder", "description" : "The order you wish to sort in. Either 'ascending' or 'descending'."}
